wordpressPage.title: East Anglia
wordpressPage.content:
Fellowship Afloat Charitable Trust, Tollsbury, Essex – Website

Fellowship Afloat offer the opportunity for young people to spend a week on a lightship. They can fully cater and offer a whole variety of activities.

The Asheldham Centre, Southminster, Essex – Website

A residential centre in a converted 1000 year old church in Essex with kitchen and beds for up to 28 people. Asheldham is an ideal budget option for groups. See their website for more information.

Letton Hall – Dereham, Norfolk – Website

Letton Hall is an old country house in rural Norfolk and offers hire of the hall and also Dolphin Court (a separate area also for hire), you can hire both the hall or Dolphin Court.

Letton Hall can hold 65 people, Dolphin Court can hold just over 50 and both sites also have the option for camping to allocate extra people.

The Horstead Centre  – Norwich, Norfolk – Website

The Horstead Centre is a Christian centre just outside of Norwich and offers a range of activities for young people including rock climbing, raft building and archery and is ideal for team building weekends.

At this time we don’t have number information for this centre, please contact them for more information

Dunton Centre – Dunton, Fakenham, Norfolk – Website

The Dunton centre is a residential centre in Norfolk in a former primary school and can accommodate up to 23 people and has a good sized hall, kitchen and dining area plus a small grass area outside.

Log Cabin Site – Trimmingham, Cromer, Norfolk – Website

The log cabin site is based in Norfolk just ten minutes walk from the beach and can hold up to 16 people in dorms with space for camping outside too. The site has a small social/kitchen/dining area, 2 dorms, 1 separate dorm cabin and spacious fields and an outdoor BBQ.

St Mark’s College – Saffron Waldon, Essex – Website

A residential centre in Essex that can sleep up to 38 people and offers a range of activities. It can also be used as a conference venue.

The Chellington Centre – Bedfordshire – Website

A residential centre in Bedfordshire ideal for youth groups. The centre has a variety of packages available for accommodation, activities and food. See their website for full info.

Kingswood Centre, West Runton – West Runton, Norfolk – Website

Perched high on cliff tops overlooking the North Norfolk coastline. The main building and activities are all fairly close together within three minutes’ walk, giving this centre a friendly campus feel, however this 30 acre site is packed with indoor and outdoor activity facilities.

Kingswood, Overstrand Hall – Cromer, Norfolk – Website

Nestled right beside the beach in a beautiful area of North Norfolk, this rural setting gives young people the opportunity to get out into the great outdoors. This tranquil, stately setting gives way to an exhilarating adventure activity park set amongst pretty landscaped and wooded gardens close to the main building.

Skreens Park – Chelmsford, Essex – Website

A Scout centre that has plenty of residential options including camping and indoor accommodation. Skreens Park also offers a variety of activities. See their website for full info.
